sentences.en: a bank loan
sentences.cn: 银行贷款

sentences.en: a blood/sperm bank
sentences.cn: 血 / 精液库

sentences.en: A string of five rowing boats set out from the opposite bank.
sentences.cn: 5只划艇排成一行从对岸出发了。

sentences.en: Bank base rates of 7 per cent are too high.
sentences.cn: 7%的银行基准利率太高了。

sentences.en: Bank robberies, burglaries and muggings are reported almost daily in the press.
sentences.cn: 报纸上几乎每天都有抢劫银行、入室行窃和拦路抢劫的报道。

sentences.en: Barclays Bank
sentences.cn: 巴克莱银行

sentences.en: Did you bank that check?
sentences.cn: 你把那张支票存入银行了吗？

sentences.en: He has 20 years of loyal service to Barclays Bank behind him.
sentences.cn: 他已经忠心耿耿地为巴克莱银行效力了20年。

sentences.en: Investigators say nearly $100,000 was wired into the suspect's bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 调查人员说有近10万美元汇入了嫌疑人的银行账户。

sentences.en: Make sure you join the queue inside the bank.
sentences.cn: 在银行里一定要排队。

sentences.en: Most farmers have bank managers breathing down their necks.
sentences.cn: 大部分农场主的一举一动都受到银行经理们的密切关注。

sentences.en: My salary is paid directly into my bank.
sentences.cn: 我的工资直接拨到我的银行。

sentences.en: On its home turf, the combined bank would be unrivalled.
sentences.cn: 那家联合银行在它自己的地盘上就无可匹敌了。

sentences.en: Sometimes, the bank manager just doesn't see it your way.
sentences.cn: 有时银行经理和你看问题的角度就是不一样。

sentences.en: The bank lifted its basic home loans rate to 10.99% from 10.75%.
sentences.cn: 银行将基本房屋贷款利率从10.75%提高到10.99%。

sentences.en: The bank must be run in a cost-effective way.
sentences.cn: 银行的经营必须追求成本效益。

sentences.en: The Bank of England seems determined to wind up the company.
sentences.cn: 英格兰银行似乎决心要关闭这家公司。

sentences.en: The bank yesterday revealed a 30 per cent nosedive in profits.
sentences.cn: 该银行昨天透露其利润骤降30％。

sentences.en: the river bank
sentences.cn: 河岸

sentences.en: They siphon foreign aid money into their personal bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 他们把国外救济金非法转入了个人银行账户。

sentences.en: We beached the canoe, running it right up the bank.
sentences.cn: 我们把独木舟径直划到岸边，并拖上岸。

sentences.en: We have very little money in the bank.
sentences.cn: 我们存在银行里的钱很少。

words.tran_cn: 银行家；银行业者；掘土工
银行业；银行业务；银行家的职业；筑堤
把钱存入银行；做银行家；在…边筑堤（bank的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 银行存款；银行往来帐户
依赖，指望：在…上有信心；依赖
开证银行；发行钞票的银行

trans.tran_cn: 银行，库，埂，堤岸，堆，排，筹码
trans.tran_en: land along the side of a river or lake

trans.tran_cn: 存钱，（转弯时）倾斜飞行，堆积
trans.tran_en: if a plane banks, it slopes to one side when turning
to put or keep money in a bank
